mapper.select: select distinct(ta_recruit_apply.recruitNo),recruitName, ta_recruit_notice.recruitHit, recruitScale, typeNo from `ta_recruit_apply`, `ta_recruit_notice` where ta_recruit_notice.recruitNo = ta_recruit_apply.recruitNo order by ta_recruit_notice.recruitNo DESC;

SELECT TA_RECRUIT_TYPE.TYPENO ,TA_RECRUIT_TYPE.TYPENAME ,TA_RECRUIT_NOTICE.RECRUITNAME FROM TA_RECRUIT_TYPE, TA_RECRUIT_NOTICE WHERE
TA_RECRUIT_NOTICE.TYPENO = TA_RECRUIT_TYPE.TYPENO;
mapper.update: UPDATE TA_RECRUIT_NOTICE SET RECRUITHIT = RECRUITHIT + 1 WHERE RECRUITNO = #{RECRUITNO}
